akn:section.akn:heading: Engagement of United States diplomatic missions

akn:content.akn:p: § 7643. Engagement of United States diplomatic missions As soon as practicable but not later than 2 years after October 7, 2016, each chief of mission to a focus country should begin to implement the recommendations contained in the strategic plan required under section 7631(a)(2) of this title, among other goals, for the country. (Pub. L. 114–231, title IV, § 403, Oct. 7, 2016, 130 Stat. 955.)
